item.title: 3 killed in small plane crash in Boca Raton, Florida
item.description: A small plane crashed in Boca Raton, Florida, on Friday morning, according to Boca Raton police.

item.title: What to know about Trump's health as he undergoes latest physical
item.description: President Donald Trump will undergo his annual physical at Walter Reed Medical Center, marking his first exam of his second term.
